text: In view of the upcoming year 2017, children of the Ministry of Defence (MoD) staff received school items at an event held at the ministry premises yesterday (29th Thursday, December 2016).Media Secretary to the Minister of Defence Mr. Rakitha Rajapakshe made the financial contribution for the noble project and 40 children of the MoD staff received their school items during the event.President's Public Relation Officer Mr. Thilina Wewelpanawa, Mr. Palitha Palpola, Military Liaison Officer of the MoD Brig DAR Ranawaka and parents of the students were present at the occasion.
title: School items for children of MoD staff
